Certificate Requirements: Minimum grade of 'B' in courses applied to the certificate
Not open to students pursuing a Modern Languages, Linguistics & Intercultural Communication major or minor

Complete 6 credits from the following:: MLL 205 - Great Books from the French-Speaking World (3)
MLL 250 - Introduction to the French-speaking World (3)
MLL 319 - Images of Society in Contemporary French Films (3)
